promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a gigantic mythical ibex psychic-type pokemon wearing a dark crown. It can be found in cave-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, psychic or ibex. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Buckramantle, a a gigantic mythical ibex psychic-type pokemon. It can be found in cave-like environments It has the following abilities: Reigning Pulse, Dual Draw. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "ibex", "psychic" or "Buckramantle". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of psychic-type pokemon, ibex-like, mythical, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, pink bokeh lighting
generatedDescription: Mystery shrouds this colossal horned seer, nestled in cavernous retreats. Its Reigning Pulse controls the terrain, Dual Draw predicts and prepares.
